examples: The custard apple's natural sweetness makes it a perfect filling for homemade pies and tarts.
The mountain provided a natural barrier between the two valleys.
The natural tanginess of tamarind adds a unique twist to sauces, marinades, and soups.
He used turnip leaves as natural wrapping for steamed dumplings.
We used honey as a natural sweetener in our homemade salad dressing.
words.defineEn: existing in or originating from nature
words.defineVi: tồn tại trong hoặc có nguồn gốc từ thiên nhiên

examples: The restaurant featured a signature dish of slow-roasted brisket.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
The menu featured a creative dish of beef plate tacos.
The farm-to-table restaurant featured a signature dish of picnic shoulder with creamy sauce.
The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
words.defineEn: an important or distinctive aspect of something
words.defineVi: một khía cạnh quan trọng hoặc đặc biệt của một cái gì đó

examples: The forest is home to a diverse range of plant and animal species.
The forest provided us with shade on a hot summer day.
We saw a brown bear in the forest.
The hikers diligently searched the dense forest for the lost trail, using a map and compass as their guide.
He found an edible mushroom in the forest.
words.defineEn: a vast area of land that is covered with trees and shrubs
words.defineVi: một vùng đất rộng lớn được bao phủ bởi cây cối và cây bụi

examples: They discovered a hidden grove of arrowroot plants while exploring the jungle.
The elephant trumpeted loudly, announcing its presence in the jungle.
Guarding the jungle.
To them, our homes are their jungles.
But the jungle isn’t theirs alone.
words.defineEn: a tropical forest with many plants growing densely
words.defineVi: một khu rừng nhiệt đới với nhiều loại cây mọc dày đặc

examples: In front of them the valley dropped sharply away from the road.
The land dropped steeply away into a small valley.
The river flows through the valley, creating a beautiful landscape.
The mountain provided a natural barrier between the two valleys.
The river took a meandering bend through the picturesque valley.
words.defineEn: a low area of land between mountains or hills, often with a river flowing through it
words.defineVi: một vùng đất thấp giữa núi hoặc đồi, thường có một dòng sông chảy qua nó

examples: A canyon is a deep gorge or gully in the earth.
Meanwhile, erosion and other processes have also played a part, with wind and rain carving canyons, arches, and other amazing landscapes.
Like its gigantic canyon system that’s 1800 kilometers long and up to 7.5 kilometers deep.
In the past, fires have rarely crossed the canyon, but the Camp Fire was now spreading at a rate of 80 football fields a minute.
- Hi guys, we're at the Grand Canyon
words.defineEn: a valley that is deep and has very steep sides, through which a river is flowing usually
words.defineVi: một thung lũng sâu và có những mặt rất dốc, qua đó một dòng sông thường chảy

examples: The explosion wiped the island off the map.
Our dream destination for this year's vacation is a secluded tropical island.
The island had a famous lighthouse that guided ships safely to shore.
The island had stunning sunsets that painted the sky with vibrant hues.
Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
words.defineEn: a piece of land surrounded by water
words.defineVi: một mảnh đất được bao quanh bởi nước

examples: Glaciers long ago left so many clues all over the world.
Glaciers are kind of like giant ice cubes on Earth.
Glaciers are so neat!
Glaciers are made up of many layers of snow.
Glaciers crept out of their mountain ranges and down to lower elevations.
words.defineEn: a huge mass of ice that moves very slowly, usually down a slope
words.defineVi: một khối băng khổng lồ di chuyển rất chậm, thường là xuống dốc

examples: Asian landscapes range from breathtaking mountains to stunning beaches.
The west is known for its stunning landscapes and breathtaking sunsets.
We hiked up the mountain and enjoyed the breathtaking view from the top.
We critics variously declared the show brilliant, the cat's pyjamas, breathtaking, and unmissable.
The breathtaking view from the mountaintop is the crowning glory of the hiking trail, rewarding the hikers' efforts.
words.defineEn: arousing great excitement, surprise, or admiration in someone
words.defineVi: khơi dậy sự phấn khích, ngạc nhiên hoặc ngưỡng mộ ở ai đó

examples: The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.
The design of this is pretty spectacular.
It's spectacular.
But Spectacular take on documenting dreams.
But Spectacular take on documenting dreams.
words.defineEn: arousing thrill, awe, excitement, or administration, particularly due to being beautiful
words.defineVi: khơi dậy cảm giác hồi hộp, sợ hãi, phấn khích hoặc quản lý, đặc biệt là do xinh đẹp

examples: The only question is whether the President can use his extraordinary political skills to turn the tables on his opponents.
The network is probably extraordinary.
Synthetic polymers have extraordinary traits.
But these wild experiments also produced extraordinary misconceptions.
And extraordinary claims require extraordinary proof.
words.defineVi: rất bất thường, đặc biệt, hoặc đáng ngạc nhiên

examples: And high masses of clouds can indicate mountainous islands.
- I just stay on the mountainous side.
These gunmen are the rule of law in this remote mountainous region in the center of Afghanistan.
These gunmen are the rule of law in this remote mountainous region in the center of Afghanistan.
But that bow-shaped structure is somehow relatively stationary above a mountainous region on the continent called Aphrodite Terra.
words.defineEn: (of an area) having a lot of mountains
words.defineVi: (của một khu vực) có rất nhiều núi

examples: In Tetouan, we found someone who knew where the victim was from, and we headed up into a hilly district.
The theory falls flat on its face when put into practice.
The couple in the flat upstairs are always at it hammer and tongs.
We drove through the night flat-out, with the pedal to the metal.
He threw caution to the winds and rang the bell of the ground-floor flat.
For the record, I have never been to the flat.
words.defineEn: (of a surface) continuing in a straight line with no raised or hollow parts
words.defineVi: (của một bề mặt) tiếp tục theo một đường thẳng không có phần nhô lên hoặc phần rỗng

examples: My mouth felt completely dry.
I dried my hands with a soft towel.
His throat was dry as dust.
Try some dried apricots as a healthy snack.
The flowers died during a dry spell.
words.defineVi: thiếu độ ẩm hoặc chất lỏng

examples: A huge percentage of the nation's fruits and vegetables, nuts, and beef come of this increasingly arid West.
Her native habitat is the arid regions of south central South America as opposed to eastern Brazil.
The habitat there consists of semi-arid forests, arid forests, and rocky deserts.
In an arid desert basin in Mongolia, around 30 million years ago, a very large mammal was on the lookout for food.
At the poles, lush ecosystems took hold, while parts of western North America became arid.
words.defineEn: (of land or a climate) very dry because of not having enough or any rain
words.defineVi: (của đất hoặc khí hậu) rất khô vì không có đủ hoặc không có mưa

examples: A variety of plants and wildlife thrive on the lush riverbank.
The African landscape is diverse, ranging from lush rainforests to vast deserts.
We go to Lush.
At the poles, lush ecosystems took hold, while parts of western North America became arid.
This flower lives in a lush Alaskan meadow.
words.defineEn: (of vegetation) growing densely and looking strong and healthy
words.defineVi: (của thảm thực vật) phát triển dày đặc và trông mạnh mẽ và khỏe mạnh

examples: The leaves on the trees are green.
The lights changed to green.
The color green has a restful effect.
The green frog hopped from one lily pad to another.
The vibrant green color of perilla leaves adds an attractive touch to any dish.
words.defineEn: having the color of fresh grass or most plant leaves
words.defineVi: có màu của cỏ tươi hoặc hầu hết các lá cây
